mapper.select: select /* COEMenuRoleMapper.getMenuRoleLogListCnt */ count(*) from co_adm_mod_mst mst

sql.where:
and (select max(a.mod_seq) from co_adm_mod_mst a where a.mod_seq != mst.mod_seq and a.trgt_adm_id = mst.trgt_adm_id and a.mod_seq < mst.mod_seq ) is not null
and mst.reg_dtm >= str_to_date(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and mst.reg_dtm < date_add(str_to_date(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)
and mst.adm_id like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
and mst.adm_nm like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
and mst.adm_dept like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
and mst.trgt_adm_id like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
and mst.trgt_adm_nm like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
and mst.trgt_adm_dept like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
and ( mst.adm_id like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or mst.adm_nm like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or mst.adm_dept like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or mst.trgt_adm_id like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or mst.trgt_adm_nm like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or mst.trgt_adm_dept like concat('%', #{q}, '%') )

mapper.select: select /* COEMenuRoleMapper.selectModDtl */ adm_id , adm_nm , adm_dept as adm_dept_nm , mod_dtm , trgt_adm_id , trgt_adm_nm , trgt_adm_dept as trgt_adm_dept_nm , reg_dtm from co_adm_mod_mst where mod_seq = #{detailsKey}

select /* COEMenuRoleMapper.selectModMenuList */ group_concat(mm.menu_nm order by mm.lft_val separator ' > ') as menu_nm , mm.menu_seq , group_concat(mm.rht_val order by mm.rht_val desc) as rht_val from co_menu_mst mm
, co_adm_mod_dtl md where md.mod_seq = #{bfreModSeq}
, ( select menu_seq from co_adm_mod_dtl where (mod_seq = #{detailsKey} or mod_seq = #{bfreModSeq}) and menu_seq not in ( select a.menu_seq from co_adm_mod_dtl a join co_adm_mod_dtl b on a.menu_seq = b.menu_seq where a.mod_seq = #{detailsKey} and b.mod_seq = #{bfreModSeq} ) )md where 1=1
and mm.lft_val <= (select lft_val from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = md.menu_seq) and mm.rht_val >= (select rht_val from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = md.menu_seq) and dpth >= (select dpth - 3 from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = md.menu_seq) and mm.menu_seq != 1 group by md.menu_seq having count(rht_val) > 1 order by rht_val
